titleInfo.title: Marine Research Laboratory at Grand Terre

originInfo.publisher: Louisiana. Dept. of Wildlife and Fisheries

mods.abstract: In the past, the principle research conducted at the Marine Research Laboratory at Grand Terre was limited in great part to the Greater Barataria Bay area. The new program will provide scientific and support personnel and equipment to work throughout the entire coastal area. It will enable expansion and intensification of the biological program into all fields of fisheries research and management and will also permit development work such as oyster lease control monuments and shell plantings.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection

mods.accessCondition: Copyright of federal and state documents is in the public domain.
Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
